examples.example: 我爱她就像热爱那温暖的阳光般热烈而执着。

translate.english: I love her as passionately and persistently as loving that warm sunshine.

examples.example: 我爱她，愿用一生的时光陪伴她，让她永远幸福快乐。

translate.english: I love her and am willing to accompany her with the whole life time to make her always happy and joyful.

examples.example: 我爱她，并发自内心地希望她每天都能开心快乐。

translate.english: I love her, and sincerely hope she can be happy every day.
